channel.title: PI - I Respawn Where I die? Help
channel.description: Title pretty much says it, When killed by a player you respawn on the square you've been defeated on. I forget where to edit the spawn. I believe its under PlayerAssistant.java, public void applyDead() somewhere.

item.title: PI - I Respawn Where I die? Help
item.dc:creator: @sume sume
item.description:
@sume wrote:

Well in some servers u respawn where u die if ur teleblocked.
It depend’s what source u use… settings.java is on pretty high revisions, and on lower it is config
Hope it helped.

-Sume

Read full topic
item.source: PI - I Respawn Where I die? Help
